page.title: 13Children in Wooler
page.content: There are many activities in Wooler for the youngsters.There is both a junior and senior Youth Club held at Glendale School and there are youth evening classes held during the winter months.In the town there are Cub Packs Scouts,Brownies and Guides.There are also groups connected to the churches. For many of the children there is little time during the week for leisure activities,particularly during the winter months, as it is dark by the time they get home from school. The children of High School age must travel to either Alnwick or Berwick leaving early in the morning and ret- urning late in the evening.
